title: 2 bedroom, Controlled-entry access, Situated in Henderson!
posting_body: South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.

With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.

Separate dining area-Subway tile kitchen backsplash-Oversized walk-in closets-Exterior storage available-Wood-style plank flooring-Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity-Stainless steel appliances including refrigerator and dishwasher                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                Featured amenity-Polished kitchen countertops-Two-tone paint scheme Select units
Fenced dog park with pet watering station-Barbecue pavilions and picnic area-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:
